long_description: The men's Eider Yosemite rain jacket looks sleek while protecting against windy, rainy weather. You can depend on this jacket's protection whether you're in town or on the mountain. 2-layer nylon shell fabric provides year-round waterproof, breathable protection and total versatility in the mountains. Tough fabric also offers high durability. Silky taffeta lining helps blocks wind and slides easily over layers; mesh lining in upper body enhances moisture wicking to help keep you dry. Hood has a brim and drawcord to protect head and can be zipped off to save weight. External windflap, softly lined collar and chin guard enhance comfort. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs seal in warmth. Eider Yosemite rain jacket has zippered hand, chest and sleeve pockets, and an inside stash pocket.
short_description: The men's Eider Yosemite rain jacket looks sleek while protecting against windy, rainy weather. You can depend on this jacket's protection whether you're in town or on the mountain.
